name: apache-superset
description: Apache Superset is an open-source data visualization and business intelligence platform that allows users to explore, visualize, and analyze data via dashboards and SQL queries. It is cloud-ready and supports plugins and rich visualizations.
features: Data Visualization: Create stunning charts, graphs, and dashboards from your data. Insights at a glance.
SQL Lab: Powerful SQL editor for exploring and querying databases. Full SQL capabilities.
Rich Visualizations: Dozens of chart types and visualization options included. Express data beautifully.
Dashboard Builder: Drag-and-drop interface for creating interactive dashboards. No coding required.
Database Support: Connect to most SQL databases and data warehouses. Universal compatibility.
Plugin Architecture: Extend functionality with custom visualizations and connectors. Infinitely extensible.
Cloud-Ready: Deploy on-premises or in the cloud with ease. Flexible deployment.
